entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
